sentences.en: A man came to read the electricity meter .
sentences.cn: 有个男的来抄电表。

sentences.en: A man came to read the electricity meter.
sentences.cn: 有个男的来抄电表。

sentences.en: A man came to read the gas meter.
sentences.cn: 有位男子来查过煤气表。

sentences.en: Also, if you recall, we added the row for meter to yard conversion.
sentences.cn: 此外，如果您还记得，我们添加了从米到码的转换行。

sentences.en: Either you or Master Li has repaired the meter.
sentences.cn: 不是你就是李师傅把仪表修好的.

sentences.en: He came in third in the hundred-meter dash.
sentences.cn: 在百米竞赛中他跑了第三名。

sentences.en: He walked away from all his competitors in the 3000 - meter race.
sentences.cn: 在3000米赛跑中,他遥遥领先于他的对手们.

sentences.en: He was there to read the electricity meter.
sentences.cn: 他到那里抄电表。

sentences.en: Light meter out of left breast pocket. Check it at f / 8.
sentences.cn: 从左胸口袋中拿出光谱仪, 对到1/8.

sentences.en: Only a third of these households thought it reasonable to meter water.
sentences.cn: 这些家庭当中只有三分之一认为用水表计量是合理的。

sentences.en: Rhyme and meter are assistants to memory.
sentences.cn: 押韵和格律有助于记忆.

sentences.en: sound-level/light etc meter
sentences.cn: 噪声计/光度计等

sentences.en: Space the desk a meter apart so that the pupils can't cheat.
sentences.cn: 把桌子按一米的间隔摆开以防学生作弊.

sentences.en: The amount of electricity used is recorded by a meter.
sentences.cn: 电表记录下耗电量.

sentences.en: The iris of the eye is photographed from up to one meter away.
sentences.cn: 眼睛的虹膜最远可在一公尺外的距离接受摄影。

sentences.en: The man from the gas board came to read the gas meter.
sentences.cn: 煤气公司派来的人来查煤气表的读数.

sentences.en: The Si unit for length is the meter, m.
sentences.cn: 长度的SI单位 是米(m).

sentences.en: The taxi driver left the meter running while I ran in to pick up my bags.
sentences.cn: 我跑进去拿行李时，出租车司机让计价器继续走字。

sentences.en: They have the right to come in and inspect the meter.
sentences.cn: 他们有权进来查表。

sentences.en: This meter has two buckets fastered together and mounted over a pivot.
sentences.cn: 这种流量计有两个称杯,它们是连接在一起并装在中心轴上的.

sentences.en: Use spot meter to isolate bridge roof, then shady side of bridge.
sentences.cn: 用特写仪把桥顶单独划出, 然后是桥的背阴影面.

sentences.en: When officials like gas and electricity men call to read the meter, ask for identification.
sentences.cn: 当有燃气或电力公司的职员来抄表时，要请他们出示身份证件。

phrases.tran_cn: 热量表；量热计；热电偶温度计
计数读数；仪表读数，计数器读数
湿度计；湿度测量计；湿度表
电压表；伏特表；差动式伏特计
电表，电度表；[电]瓦特小时计

trans.tran_en: a machine that measures and shows the amount of something you have used or the amount of money that you must pay
to measure how much of something is used, and how much you must pay for it, by using a meter
